title: Google\Cloud\NetworkConnectivity\V1\LinkedVpnTunnels
name: LinkedVpnTunnels
description:
A collection of Cloud VPN tunnel resources. These resources should be redundant HA VPN tunnels that all advertise the same prefixes to Google Cloud. Alternatively, in a passive/active configuration, all tunnels should be capable of advertising the same prefixes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkconnectivity.v1.LinkedVpnTunnels

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.uris
params.description: The URIs of linked VPN tunnel resources.

params.name: data.site_to_site_data_transfer
params.description: A value that controls whether site-to-site data transfer is enabled for these resources. Data transfer is available only in supported locations.

params.name: data.vpc_network
params.description: Output only. The VPC network where these VPN tunnels are located.
